import React, { Component } from "react"; class AddMeeting extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { date: "", name: "", email: "", subject: "", start: "", end: "", meetingRoomId: props.meetingRoomId, }; } handleChange = (e) => { const itemName = e.target.name; const itemValue = e.target.value; this.setState({ [itemName]: itemValue }); }; handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.AddMeeting( this.state.date, this.state.name, this.state.email, this.state.subject, this.state.start, this.state.end, this.state.meetingRoomId ); this.setState({ date: "", name: "", email: "", subject: "", start: "", end: "", meetingRoomId: props.meetingRoomId, }); }; render() { return (

Booking meeting

); } } export default AddMeeting;
